SUBREGISTRANature of Land:
The Government has obtained the title deed from them and has received receipt No. 201184622444563 confirming that there are no dues from the Housing Development Corporation on the house sites which are in the possession of the rightful owner for more than 10 years.
The application for title deed/title deed certificate as explained above is for the purpose of granting full and permanent rights to the house sites enjoyed by the rightful owners or heirs under the Government's Jagannana Sampurna Gruha Haqq Scheme. It has been decided to register.
AP Assigned Lands (POT) (AMENDMENT), section 3 (2A) and Section 3 (2B; and GO MS no 314, Revenue (Lands-I) Department, dated: 11/11/2021, this document is hereby given in writing.
Therefore, from now on, you can freely enjoy the said Schedule Afri as per your wish, up to your son and grandson, with the powers of donation, exchange, sale and disposal. If you do so, neither you, your heirs, your representatives nor the Government of Andhra Pradesh or their representatives will have any claim or dispute in future against you. All taxes payable on the said immovable property shall be paid by you in your name.
The hanneks of the State Government Signature
Tahsildar
Padmanabham

You are hereby granted full rights to mortgage the said immovable property with any bank or private institution of your choice and avail loan facility to meet your needs.
You are hereby granted full rights to sell or mortgage the said immovable property. The property can be registered without any kind of NOC in the office of the concerned Registrar.
The said Schedule can be registered without the need for a No Objection Certificate (NOC) from any government department when it comes to sale or purchase before the Sub-Registrar in the office of the concerned Sub-Registrar.

encumbranceDetails.description: VILL/COL: Ananthavaram/Ananthavaram W-B: 8-0 SURVEY: 126 HOUSE:8-1/1 EXTENT: 57.728SQ.Yds BUILT: 519SQ. FT Boundires: [N]: K SURYANARAYANA [S] CC ROAD [E]: K CHINNAPPADU [W]: CC ROAD

sections.content: The property covered under Sale Deed No. 81045 of 2022, dated 19/Apr/2022, executed by the Government of Andhra Pradesh Rep by, Adabala Srinivasa Rao, Padmananbham Tahsildar in favour of Kotthala Ramanamma, towards the property admeasuring an extent of 57.7284 Sq. Yds, bearing house number 1-1, comprised in survey number 126, situated in Ananthavaram Village, Padmanabham Mandal, within the District of Visakhapatnam, registered at sub-registrar office Ananthavaram(733), is bounded as follows: North by: K. Suryanarayana South by: CC Road East by: K. Chinnappadu West by: CC Road
It is noted from the given documents and EC that the schedule property is not part of any active Mortgage or Lease Deed.

Note:1. It is to be noted that the online EC has been verified using the key parameters, namely the Document Number, Survey Number/House Number, and Split Survey/House Number of the concerned SRO, as per the Deed. However, cross-verification across multiple SROs has not been carried out due to the AP portal’s requirement of separate passwords for each search parameter, and the OTP-based authentication mechanism makes searches across multiple SROs operationally infeasible. Further, It is observed from the recitals of the deed that the SRO Name is mentioned as Ananathavaram, whereas, the document is registered before the SRO Bheemunipatnam, it is, therefore advisable for F.I. to verify the same.
